text: Simone Sterbini (born 11 December 1993) is an Italian former professional racing cyclist, who rode professionally between 2015 and 2019 for the and teams. ==Major results== ;2013 : 10th Gran Premio Palio del Recioto ;2014 : 1st 20px Road race, National Under-23 Road Championships : 10th Gran Premio Palio del Recioto ;2016 : 1st Stage 5 Tour of Austria ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Simone Sterbini
